sentences.sContent: He pulled out to overtake the van.
sentences.sCn: 他把车驶出所在车道想超过那辆小货车。

sentences.sContent: Never try to overtake on a bend.
...China could overtake the United States as the world's largest express market...
...Kodak anticipated that digital photography would overtake film--and in fact...

remMethod.val: over ＋ take → 追上， 超过

trans.tranCn: 追上， 超过； 突然降临于， 意外地碰上
trans.tranOther: to go past a moving vehicle or person because you are going faster than them and want to get in front of them
